member.name: T:BlazorWorker.WorkerCore.MessageService
member.summary: Simple static message service that runs in the worker thread.

member.name: M:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of WorkerInitOptions

member.name: P:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions.DependentAssemblyFilenames
member.summary: Specifies a list of assembly files names (dlls) that should be loaded when initializing the worker.

member.name: P:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions.MessageEndPoint
member.summary: Mono-wasm-annotated endpoint for sending messages to the worker. Experts only.

member.name: P:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions.InitEndPoint
member.summary: Mono-wasm-annotated endpoint for instanciating the worker. Experts only.

member.name: P:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions.CallbackMethod
member.summary: Unique blazor identifier for handling callbacks. As referenced by JSInvokableAttribute. Experts only.

member.name: P:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions.UseConventionalServiceAssembly
member.summary: If set to true, deducts the name of the assembly containing the service using the service type assembly name + dll extension as file name, and adds it as a dependency.

member.name: M:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptionsExtensions.AddAssemblies(BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the specified assembly filesnames as dependencies

member.name: M:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptionsExtensions.AddConventionalAssemblyOfService(BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions)
member.summary: Deducts the name of the assembly containing the service using the the service type assembly name with dll extension as file name, and adds it as a dependency.

member.name: M:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptionsExtensions.AddAssemblyOf``1(BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions)
member.summary: Deducts the name of the assembly containing the specified using the assembly name with dll extension as file name, and adds it as a dependency.

member.name: M:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptionsExtensions.AddAssemblyOfType(BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions,System.Type)
member.summary: Deducts the name of the assembly containing the specified using the assembly name with dll extension as file name, and adds it as a dependency.

member.name: M:BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptionsExtensions.AddHttpClient(BlazorWorker.Core.WorkerInitOptions)
member.summary: Registers the neccessary dependencies for injecting or instanciating in the background service.
member.remarks: When this method has been called, can be used inside the service either by instanciating it or by injection into the constructor.
